1. Optimized the experience of some features.
2. Fixed the bug that some old files can't be opened.
3. Fixed some known bugs.

* Fixed the problem in Chinese (Traditional) UI display;

And in the next version, we will fix the problem for label editing with Matrix structure, add the feature of adding topic link, and fix other known bug. Thanks you for supporting XMind.

If you are using iOS 13, please update your beta to the latest version. And this app is temporarily unable to support Google Drive on iOS 13.

1. Support direct click response of note, hyperlink, attachment, etc.
2. Fixed issue of XMind 8 files opened failure.
3. Fixed issue of files opened failure in iOS 13.
4. Fixed canvas positioning issues in iOS 13.
5. Fixed apps crashing issue in iOS 13.
6. Fixed other known issues.
* Fixed an issue of blurred preview when inserting the image.

1. Add "Topic Link", and linking of different topics is available.
2. Add “Search Panel", and support topics and notes searching.
3. Compatible with Dark Mode of iOS 13.

*Fixed an issue of wrap text failure when editing topic.

1.  Add "Topic Link", and linking of different topics is available.
2. Add “Search Panel", and support topics and notes searching.
3. Compatible with Dark Mode of iOS 13.
* Fixed the application freezed issue when using Drawing.

1. Fixed the issue that some XMind 8 files failed to open;
2. Fixed the issue that Topic Link and Audio Note could not be opened in special circumstances.
Fixed the issue that Edit Menu might not be displayed properly in iOS 12 and below.
Fixed the issue that some devices can't open XMind file.

1. Added new stickers, interesting yet practical;
2. Fixed an issue that would cause Outliner to crash.

1. Fixed the problem that XMind file cannot be opened normally in XMind 8;
2. Add a new size when exporting Outliner to PDF.

1. Fixed the problem that XMind could not be operated after sharing file to some other applications；
2. Fixed some other known minor issues.
Fixed some known UI issues.

• Improved the speed of opening files.
• Fixed the problem of inaccurate map positioning.
• Tap the status bar to display the selected topic, or central topic as the center of the visible area.
• Fixed known bugs with improvements.

• Follow parent topic’s structure is now added for subtopics.
• Added flexible floating topic, which allows topics to be free positioned and not connected to any branch.
• Six recently used color themes are recorded for you.
• Tab key can be used as a shortcut to quit editing quickly.
• Optimized the editing experience of notes, such as clicking on a blank area to enter editing, etc.
• Fixed the redirection issue of some web links.
• Fixed known bugs with improvements.

• Fix the problem of text missing after exporting PDF/PNG.
• Fix the incorrect redirection when the topic link is inserted through search.
• Fix some invalid redirect issues of web links.
• The issue of exiting to document browser when opening Airdrop file is fixed.

· Support iOS 15 & iPadOS 15.
· Present your mind map like a slideshow in Pitch Mode.
· Added Sheet List button at the bottom left of the map to enhance the multiple sheets editing experiences.
· Support for importing Markdown files.
· Added new vertical and horizontal (Off-axis) layouts for Timeline structure.
· Support hyperlinks (auto-detect, insert and edit) in notes.
· Use Compact Map layout to reduce the size and spacing of elements.
· Justify topic alignment to unify the width of topics at the same level and organize your map.
· Bugs fixes and improvements.

· Enable to edit label by selecting it directly.
· Inaccurate manual width values of a few shapes have been corrected.
· Fixed the display error of equation.
· Fixed the problem of invalid italic text.
· You can present a mind map including old version markers in pitch mode.
· Upwards/Downwards Arrow can be used as shortcuts to present previous/next step in pitch mode.
· Fixed the problem of turning off animation by default in pitch mode.

· Added aspect ratio function in pitch mode, which can automatically adapt to the best slide size as the screen changes by default.
· Enable to present a mind map with equations.
· Fixed the problem that the duplicated sheet cannot be saved.
· Fixed the problem of text missing after exporting PNG/PDF in some specific cases.
· Improved the rendering effect of the equation and made it consistent with the preview.
· The key of shift+return can be used as a shortcut to insert return in outliner.
· Fixed the problem that the file cannot be opened by adding callout to the timeline topic.
· Fixed the layout error of tree table.

· Support for case-insensitive search and one-click replacement of the whole workbook.
· Allow to use the shortcut of ⌥⌘1～9 to fold/unfold to the specific level of subtopics.
· Optimized the input assistant items of the soft keyboard.
· Fixed the problem that files cannot be opened in some specific cases.
· Fixed the crash problem that may occur when exporting PDF in outliner mode.
· Fixed the problem that the shortcuts cannot be used after inserting an equation.
· Fixed known bugs with improvements.
